description: Json schema for Security Profile config

AdditionalRootCertificateCheck.description: When set to true, only one certificate (plus a temporarily fallback certificate) of certificateType CentralSystemRootCertificate is allowed to be installed at a time

AuthorizationKey.description: The basic authentication password is used for HTTP Basic Authentication

CertificateSignedMaxChainSize.description: This configuration key can be used to limit the size of the 'certificateChain' field from the CertificateSigned.req PDU.

CertificateStoreMaxLength.description: Maximum number of Root/CA certificates that can be installed in the Charge Point.

CpoName.description: This configuration key contains CPO name (or an organization trusted by the CPO) as used in the Charge Point Certificate.

SecurityProfile.description: This configuration key is used to set the security profile used by the Charge Point
